short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove inactive and deactivated friends from your FB account using Xooma Intelligence Disconnector

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Xi Disconnector removes inactive and deactivated friends from FB.

It will evaluate the engagement of your Friends over a period of time you select, and can then easily remove people who are not engaging with your posts or replying to your DMs. 

You can also whitelist friends you never want to accidentally delete, such as family and "real life" social contacts.

Social media is all about engagement and exposure. 

If there are friends who are not engaging with your content, it can affect your post views, and decrease exposure and engagement with your content.

With this extension, you will always know who is engaging with you and who is not, and the software can handle it from there, based on your instructions.

Keeping your Friends list to those most engaged will make vast differences in how many people see, and can interact with, your content.

This extension also includes a link to our Helpdesk, as well as training videos.

This is an authorized white label of Tier5â€™s "Friend Disconnector" extension.

Start increasing your engagement today!
